name: Dragoon Fusion
text: This Spell Card is always treated as a "Omni" Spell Card. you can Fusion Summon 1 "Dragoon" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Materials. If your opponent controls a Ritual, Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, Pendulum or Link monster, you can also use a Normal Monster in your Deck as material for this Fusion Summon.
